name: UNSHADE 'EM
description:
Find your way to The Tower, but beware of it's guardians, as you can only see their shadows!

Controls:

W/S/A/D, mouse, left mouse button (spray light), right mouse button (charge attack), space (detonate spray)

Game made during Slavic Game Jam 2017 by:

  • Adam "Chopin" Andrzejczak - production, design, vfx, programming
  • Marek Łukasiewicz - lead programming
  • Igor Samek - animations & player model
  • Rafał Rzeuski - AI programming
  • Aleksandra Wiak - 2d graphics 
  • Dawid W. Mika - sound desing
  • Mateusz Głuszek - 3d environment
  • Katarzyna Mitrus - programming
